long_description: Thanks to Tenacious Tape(TM) patches from Gear Aid, you can repair rips, tears or holes in nearly all of your outdoor gear. With 2 clear 3 in. patches and 2 black 3 in. patches, you can make lasting repairs in the field or at home. Precut patches are made from high-quality tent fabric and use clean, adhesive technology. They stay put no matter what Mother Nature dishes out, and will not leave a sticky mess; tape is strong, long-lasting and washable. Repairs camping gear, sleeping bags and pads, tents, clothing, vinyl rafts, down jackets, netting and more. When you need to make quick, invisible repairs, turn to Tenacious Tape patches from Gear Aid.
short_description: Thanks to Tenacious Tape(TM) patches from Gear Aid, you can repair rips, tears or holes in nearly all of your outdoor gear.
